original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u, badges as b WHERE u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND u.Id = b.UserId AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=2 AND u.Views=5 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=224 AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-04 04:41:22' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-07-19 19:39:10' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-05 18:37:48' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 2
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 19:39:10' AND CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-05 18:37:48'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Views = 5 AND users.DownVotes >= 0 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 224) AND users.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-04 04:41:22'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4.UserId=E3.Id)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E3E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4E3.UserId=E2.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E3E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E3E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E4E3E2.UserId)
